title: Group Functions and SubQueries
text: This page will roughly cover the five GROUP functions, GROUP BY, and using SubQueries.

title: SQL
text:
A website dedicated to fundamental SQL use.
The DBMS the SQL queries are ran through, and respective syntax used, will PostgreSQL.
Much of the content originated from The Structured Query Language (SQL), through CU Boulder on Coursera.
The database used for practice is the North Winds Database. Implementation code can be found here.

title: The Basic SELECT
text:
Where every course in SQL begins, the SELECT statement. We’ll then venture into other basic functions.
Let’s practice some SQL queries on the Northwinds Database.

Basic SELECT

Query
SELECT * from employees
Result
